message: Take it or leave it, Bob. It's a fair offer.
I think we can be more fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but I'll be generous in the next round if you accept.
I'm not sure what you're playing at, Bob.  I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not going to give you the lion's share. Let's get back to a more reasonable split.  This is my final offer.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to split the money evenly this time.  We can both benefit from a fair deal.
